body.name: JEHONN Wall Cleaner Mop with Long Handle 82 Inches, 3-in-1 Ceiling Cleaning Tool Duster with 6 Replacement Microfiber Chenille Pads for Painted Walls, Baseboard, Window, Floor (Green)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 6 mins
features: LONG ENOUGH TO REACH HIGH PLACE: JEHONN wall cleaner mop includes 5 metal extension poles, can be extended from 37” to 82”. This wall scrubber keeps you away from danger, comfortably cleans high windows or walls without climbing ladders.

EFFECTIVE AT CLEANING BASEBORD: This wall washer mop features with a 90° flipped panel, which perfectly fits for cleaning baseboard. The chenille mop pads can collect dust, hair or small debris effectively.

6 PCS PADS FOR DRY & WET USE: The triangle mop comes with 3 Pcs microfiber pads and 3 Pcs chenille pads. The microfiber pads can be wet-used for mopping and window cleaning, while chenille pads can be dry-used for dusting and removing spider webs.

CLEANING CORNERS THOROUGHLY: 360 Degree rotating head on this wall duster can flexibly reach dead ends, corners or other narrow places. No need to worry about that it will be loosening or flipping around.

BUILT-IN SQUEEGEE BAR: The 360° rotating adjustable cleaning mop has a silicone squeegee, which can scrape water on floor, window, glass, mirror. JEHONN has committed to cleaning products for more than 10 years. Quality is guaranteed. Please rest assured to purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cleaning pads, great reach!
reviews.reviewText: I am fixing up a house that I just had renters move out of (let's just say they were rough on the place). I have used the full extension to clean the walls for painting and made it shorter to mop the floors. With it fully extended, there is a bit of flex in the rod while scrubbing but it's minimal- I'm happy with how sturdy this is. Dry mopping with just the fluffy head picked up a ton of drywall dust out of the grooves in the hardwood from where I have been patching and sanding. Using it with Odoban has done a very good job of reducing urine smells from the flooring. A tip for the baseboards since I saw a review saying that the edge wasn't bending easily: take the pad off of the corner, flip it up, and THEN reattach the pad- however, if you want to flatten the head, you will have a groove in the pad and will need to readjust it again to get rid of it. It's a very minor inconvenience given how easy to use this product is and how well it works. The only thing I have to complain about is that sometimes the head gets stuck in a flat position, and you have to reach up and adjust it back out to continue using it. I haven't used the squeegee on any windows yet. Overall I am thrilled with this purchase as it's making my life a whole lot easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble easy to use an effective in doing what it was designed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for small jobs
reviews.reviewText: This is very sturdy and works great. Love the different options for cloths it comes with. However, it is pretty small if you're planning to clean all of your walls. I'll continue to use for spot cleaning

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Was blown away at how great this was to use. It is very sturdy - not flimsy like some extension poles. It's well made with each section screwing in, not slipped in like some products. The cleaning mop and duster provided are well made too and easy to clean. I just throw it in the washing machine and air dry. Makes cleaning walls and ceiling so much easier to reach plus it does the cleaning job! I would highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Easy to control.
reviews.reviewText: The pads were wobbily, hard to control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great ceiling or wall mop
reviews.reviewText: So amazing I shared on social media the same day. Saved so much time cleaning the bathroom ceiling & prepping for repainting. Also awesome for big open foyer walls and high corners where I normally cannot reach.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does a great job of cleaning dust that accumulates on ceilings from ceiling fans

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's good, but when you add the extenders to it, it feels weak like it wants to break. It's great for cleaning glass and floors.

Purchased on sale, great little item for cleaning the shower, floors, walls etc.Nice size is easy to use for those quick clean-ups. Lots of extra cleaning pads.Variety of lengths depending on how many handle sections you decide to use.A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've used it to clean conservatory ceiling, excellent mop I really like you can adjust the handle's length. Worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My rooms had lots of cobwebs, this did a fantastic job of removing all of them. It can also be used for cleaning walls if needed. It's well made and the pole is screwed together in sections

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use to dry shower tray to save bending down. Item received within promised date. Impressed with packaging as box was right size for mop. It is well made sturdy and depending what length you require it can be adjusted. Mop and cleaning heads seem good quality. I am impressed and will find it invaluable for cleaning high walls. I would certainly buy again as and when required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought to clean the ceiling prior to painting. Easy to use and especially liked the long reach.
